ABOUT US

Agile Investments
In Solid Ground

Since 2010

Leopard Asset Management is dedicated to guiding clients toward lasting financial growth through expertly managed real estate assets. With over a decade of experience, we’ve built a reputation for agile decision-making and unwavering commitment to returns, offering tailored strategies from commercial properties to residential portfolios. Let us help you secure your financial future, built on a foundation of trust and opportunity.

Latest Insights
from the Property Market

Red Flags in Conducting Due Diligence on Listed Real Estate Companies

When deciding to spend time researching a real estate company, it is useful to start with red flags.

By: Ophir Dortheimer Jul 23, 24

Leopard Asset Management Urges Sun Corporation’s Shareholders to Hold Management Accountable for Their Failure to Achieve Their Own Stated Goals of Increasing Shareholder Value

Leopard Asset Management Ltd. (“LAM”) advises various longstanding minority shareholders in Sun Corporation (stock code: 6736 JP). LAM urges Sun’s shareholders to hold management accountable for their failure to achieve their own stated goals of increasing shareholder value. On June 25, vote against Ryusuke Utsumi, CEO and his management team.

By: Ophir Dortheimer Jul 10, 24

Leopard Asset Management Expresses Concerns Over Sun Corporation's Lack of Action to Enhance Shareholder Value

Leopard Asset Management Ltd. (“LAM”) advises various longstanding minority shareholders in Sun Corporation (stock code: 6736 JP). LAM is compelled to express its deep concerns regarding the company’s ongoing undervaluation and management’s apparent reluctance to take meaningful action to address this issue.

By: Ophir Dortheimer Apr 04, 24
